short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify the print styles for articles on Good Beer Hunting so they can be saved to PDF.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension modifies the print styles (typography, spacing, site navigation) for articles on GoodBeerHunting.com so that articles can be saved to PDF for archiving.

Simply install the extension and visit any editorial article on GoodBeerHunting.com and then print or save to PDF.
